Memory of a Thousand Lifetimes.name: Memory of a Thousand Lifetimes
Memory of a Thousand Lifetimes.flavor: The dreamlike memories of your previous lives lend insight to aid you.
keywords:
Personal

Trigger: You make an attack roll, a saving throw, a skill check, or an ability check and dislike the result

Effect: You add 1d6 to the triggering roll.
